conbody.p: This tab is helpful for recording the working process. The provided input fields are the following:
Enter the modus of the text's line count (e.g. define how the lines are counted in your text). Line count is only visible for the item-type "text".
Enter the dates of your working process here (e.g. first entering, editing etc.).
Define the type of your textual witness/object here.
Write any additional comments you may have to your work.
